title: TheMuse.com Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape jobs from TheMuse.com. Provide a start URL for specific searches, or use keyword/location/date filters to construct search URLs. With no inputs, it automatically scrapes recent jobs.

startUrl.title: Start URL (primary option)
startUrl.description: Start from a specific TheMuse listing URL (e.g., https://www.themuse.com/search/keyword/admin/date-posted/last_7d). If provided, keyword/location/category filters are ignored.

keyword.title: Keyword (constructs search URL)
keyword.description: Job search keyword (e.g., 'software engineer', 'marketing'). Used to construct a search URL when startUrl is not provided.

location.title: Location (optional)
location.description: Location filter for constructing search URLs (e.g., 'New York', 'Remote'). Leave empty for all locations.

datePosted.title: Date posted filter
datePosted.description: Date filter for TheMuse URLs. Examples: 'last_7d', 'last_30d', 'last_month'. Leave empty for all dates.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, the actor will fetch each job's detail page to extract full description and additional metadata. Recommended for complete data.

maxItems.title: Maximum number of jobs
maxItems.description: Maximum number of jobs to collect. Set to 0 for unlimited (scrape until no more results).

maxPages.title: Maximum number of pages
maxPages.description: Safety cap on pagination. Set to 0 to paginate until empty or maxItems is reached.

dedupe.title: Deduplicate results
dedupe.description: Remove duplicate job URLs from results (in-memory deduplication by URL).

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw 'Cookie' header string. Can help bypass consent banners or maintain sessions.

cookiesJson.title: Custom cookies (JSON)
cookiesJson.description: Optional JSON-formatted cookies. Accepts array format (e.g., [{"name":"foo","value":"bar"}]) or object (e.g., {"foo":"bar"}).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Apify Proxy configuration. Residential proxies recommended for high-volume or stealth mode.

htmlFallback.title: HTML fallback (advanced)
htmlFallback.description: If the API returns no results, attempt HTML parsing as a fallback. Usually not needed.
